---
title: "Evaluating quality of de novo assembly in 100 samples from the 1000 Genomes ONT sequencing consortium."
categories: ["Bioinformatics"]
year: 2024 [<span style="color:blue; text-decoration:underline;">Preprint available</span>](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.03.05.24303792v1)
---

This project was done as a part of the first preprint from the [1000 Genomes ONT Sequencing Consortium](https://millerlaboratory.com/1000G-ONT.html). Read more [here](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2024.03.05.24303792v1).

### Methods

1.  Running de novo haploid and diploid assembly pipelines on 1000 Genomes ONT sequenced samples.
2.  Quality assessment of assembly algorithms using software.
3.  Evaluating assembly quality in OMIM genes.
